metadataAttributes.Title: Designing the Organization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Organizations are complex and can be difficult to manage well, so managers need tools to help them better understand and deal with the many complexities and challenges associated with organizational life. In this course, you will learn theories, principles, and frameworks that will help you design more effective organizations.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Organizational Structure,Knowledge of General Business Functions,Organization Design,Organizational Theory,Strategic Management,
